recipe.name: Yorkshire Pudding
recipe.preparation:
Beat mixture and let stand for 1/2 hour. Beat again and bake at 400ยบ for 30-45 minutes. Use 1/4 cup* suet or Crisco. Make sure ingredients are room temperature. Glass dish should be already hot before putting batter in.
It just said "1/4" before, I assume cup. Suet is pretty nasty stuff but I would assume its tastier than plain ol' Crisco. I would assume the latter doesn't blow out your heart as much and is -certainly- easier to find.
